name: Antistress Game: Cake on Face
description:
If you want to get rid of stress, then pull the lever and throw a cake on face. Our new antistress simulator will definitely help you coping with your stress. Pull the lever, roll the roulette and send a cake on face of your friend, neighbor or anyone else in our new simulator: Antistress Game: Cake on Face.

Our Antistress simulator will bring you lots of fun. You have a roulette with cakes, pull special lever and roll this roulette to earn a cake, and then pull the lever second time to throw the cake on face of your friend, sibling, neighbor. You may spread pieces of cake over whole face of your target. Draw with cream on the face of your “victim” in this antistress simulator you should use your imagination to earn as much fun as you can. The only thing you need to start throwing the cake on face is camera of your smartphone. Turn it on and feel all the “pros” of AR simulator.

Antistress game: cake on Face is a free to play antistress AR simulator. Pull the lever to roll a roulette and pick a special cake to throw. Choose your target and throw a cake on face, spread the cream, put a cherry on your target’s head, you are allowed to do everything you want, download and try it by yourself, but be careful, you may catch a cake by yourself!
